title: Mineways在哪里下载？
author: yu_lai
txt_content: 求助！Mineways在哪里？鸟语看不懂~~~~晕！谁能发到网盘给我？求你了QAQ，做C4D桑~！没有那个很麻烦！求求了！Mineways是什么？这里有哦！求求了！如果金粒太少了还能商量多一点，但是要告诉我答案啊！

replies.txt_content: 楼主 在这里哦，我也在学C4D呢，加下好友交流交流吧   我的企鹅：347387261

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content:
The latest version for Windows is version 4.03, for Mac it's 4.03, 32-bit only. Read the notes for the Mac - it's a bit tricky to use. For Linux, use WINE to emulate Windows. All versions work with Minecraft 1.2 and later. Mineways Version 1.15 works with Minecraft 1.1 and earlier, though I find it easier to just convert old worlds by loading them into Minecraft itself.
如果我没猜错 应该就是那个
地址:http://www.realtimerendering.com ... neways/mineways.zip
